actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 225 of the Postal Revenue and Federal Salary Act of 1967.

summary.text: Directs the Commission on Executive, Legislative and Judicial Salaries to conduct a review of the rates of pay of the Vice President of the United States, the Speaker of the House of Representatives, the Majority Leader and the Minority Leader of the Senate, and the Majority Leader and the Minority Leader of the House of Representatives. (Amends 2 U.S.C. 356)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 225 of the Postal Revenue and Federal Salary Act of 1967.
